entry.title: https://github.com/OWASP/OFFAT
entry.content: The OWASP OFFAT tool autonomously assesses your API for prevalent vulnerabilities, though full compatibility with OAS v3 is pending. The project remains a work in progress, continuously evolving towards completion.

entry.title: https://github.com/h2oai/h2ogpt
entry.content: Private chat with local GPT with document, images, video, etc. 100% private, Apache 2.0. Supports oLLaMa, Mixtral, llama.cpp, and more. Demo: https://gpt.h2o.ai/ https://gpt-docs.h2o.ai/

entry.title: https://github.com/facebookresearch/Kats
entry.content: Kats, a kit to analyze time series data, a lightweight, easy-to-use, generalizable, and extendable framework to perform time series analysis, from understanding the key statistics and characteristics, detecting change points and anomalies, to forecasting future trends.

entry.title: https://github.com/DrewThomasson/ebook2audiobook
entry.content: Convert ebooks to audiobooks with chapters and metadata using dynamic AI models and voice cloning. Supports 1,107+ languages!

entry.title: https://github.com/feder-cr/Jobs_Applier_AI_Agent
entry.content: Auto_Jobs_Applier_AI_Agent aims to easy job hunt process by automating the job application process. Utilizing artificial intelligence, it enables users to apply for multiple jobs in an automated and personalized way.

entry.title: https://github.com/NexaAI/nexa-sdk
entry.content: Nexa SDK is a comprehensive toolkit for supporting GGML and ONNX models. It supports text generation, image generation, vision-language models (VLM), Audio Language Model, auto-speech-recognition (ASR), and text-to-speech (TTS) capabilities.

entry.title: https://github.com/crewAIInc/crewAI
entry.content: Framework for orchestrating role-playing, autonomous AI agents. By fostering collaborative intelligence, CrewAI empowers agents to work together seamlessly, tackling complex tasks.

entry.title: https://github.com/Byaidu/PDFMathTranslate
entry.content: PDF scientific paper translation with preserved formats - 基于 AI 完整保留排版的 PDF 文档全文双语翻译，支持 Google/DeepL/Ollama/OpenAI 等服务，提供 CLI/GUI/Docker

entry.title: https://github.com/intuitem/ciso-assistant-community
entry.content: CISO Assistant is a one-stop-shop for GRC, covering Risk, AppSec and Audit Management and supporting +70 frameworks worldwide with auto-mapping: NIST CSF, ISO 27001, SOC2, CIS, PCI DSS, NIS2, CMMC, PSPF, GDPR, HIPAA, Essential Eight, NYDFS-500, DORA, NIST AI RMF, 800-53, 800-171, CyFun, CJIS, AirCyber, NCSC, ECC, SCF and so much more

entry.title: https://github.com/stanford-oval/storm
entry.content: An LLM-powered knowledge curation system that researches a topic and generates a full-length report with citations.

entry.title: https://github.com/black-forest-labs/flux
entry.content: Official inference repo for FLUX.1 models

entry.title: https://github.com/deepseek-ai/DeepSeek-Coder
entry.content: DeepSeek Coder: Let the Code Write Itself

entry.title: https://github.com/pathwaycom/pathway
entry.content: Python ETL framework for stream processing, real-time analytics, LLM pipelines, and RAG.
